description.rawText: The candidate will be expected to assist in the creation of a complex database.  Work independently to program a database for the Sippican and Polaris AP processors.   The tool will be required to:  1.  Database should reach out to a shared drive to obtain a daily . txt file that is downloaded from the ManMan system.  The daily file should not replace the previous days but append to a table to create a running total. 2.  Database should include a table for processors to input invoice information.  This table will also be a running total file. 3.  The main piece is the query or report.  This should take information from the invoice table and search for correct receiving information on the table from #1.  This report should be able to export as excel to be verified by processors and saved as . txt.  file to be uploaded in the system. 4.  Paid invoices and associated receiving lines should be removed from the tables of #1 and #2.   The information should still be stored somewhere for audit backup but we dont want to have duplicate payments. More info will be provided in the interview.   Plans,  evaluates,  acquires,  develops,  deploys,  maintains and supports data management and software engineering processes,  methods and tools.  Evaluates data to ensure it meets corporate policy and business data requirements.  Responsible for statistical analysis,  identification of data issues and validation of data integrity.  Ability to understand how data drives the development of applications and business requirements through appropriate design principles,  methodologies and tools.

companyDescription.rawText: SPECTRAFORCE TECHNOLOGIES INC (www. spectraforce. com) offers a powerful suite of IT and Consulting services allowing companies to embrace the challenges of meeting and exceeding the company's IT needs with an aggressive Total Cost of Ownership.  We enable companies to focus on their core competencies,  while we handle the integral details of building IT solution guaranteeing quality delivery with significant cost savings.  We offer a competitive edge through our Staff Augmentation Services (PrimuSourcing) and Projects Outsourcing  Services,  which are pwered by our Global Delivery Model with teams based onsite in the US and offshore in India.
